Sentencas: The direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell (DA-SOFC) is a prospective method for power generation but is constrained by insufficient NH3 conversion and high temperature gradient.
Titulo: Fluidizing Anode Catalysts to Promote the Performance of the Direct Ammonia Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Here, we prepared a series of NixCo10-x/MgAl2O4 catalysts and investigated their fluidization on the output characteristics and temperature distribution of the cell.
Titulo: Fluidizing Anode Catalysts to Promote the Performance of the Direct Ammonia Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results show that doping Co facilitates NH3 decomposition over Ni/MgAl2O4 with 4 wt % Co to be the optimal loading.
Titulo: Fluidizing Anode Catalysts to Promote the Performance of the Direct Ammonia Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Almost full NH3 conversion is achieved at 700 degrees C for Ni6Co4/MgAl2O4.
Titulo: Fluidizing Anode Catalysts to Promote the Performance of the Direct Ammonia Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The enhanced activity arises from Co's capability to reduce the energy barrier for the associative desorption of N, which is considered the rate-determining step in the NH3 decomposition process over Ni.
Titulo: Fluidizing Anode Catalysts to Promote the Performance of the Direct Ammonia Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Fluidizing the catalysts promotes NH3 conversion in the anode chamber, resulting in reduced anode polarization and consequent enhancement in electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Fluidizing Anode Catalysts to Promote the Performance of the Direct Ammonia Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The peak power density for the DA-SOFC with fluidizing catalysts was determined as 98.4 mW/cm(2), which is comparable to that of the H-2 SOFC and is 2.73 times as large as that of the DA-SOFC without catalysts at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Fluidizing Anode Catalysts to Promote the Performance of the Direct Ammonia Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In addition, the ability of fluidization to promote the axial heat transfer significantly reduces the peak axial temperature gradient to 6.1 degrees C/cm, lower than the suggested value (10 degrees C/cm) to ensure operational stability.
Titulo: Fluidizing Anode Catalysts to Promote the Performance of the Direct Ammonia Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Fluidizing the catalysts may provide a general strategy to simultaneously enhance the output and operational reliability of the DA-SOFC.
Titulo: Fluidizing Anode Catalysts to Promote the Performance of the Direct Ammonia Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
